39b343a32a4f1ce18ee98a34618fda0a5404d6a0.commitMessage: Issue #3143: forbid empty return statements and fixed violations

46a52f84c014e4d25379f429f11ed3de11fe8ae7.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Rename methods returning boolean to use question word

Fixes some `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

a298a50d48358e58be31eaea6b9f0e263f5f046e.commitMessage: correction to handle SEMI after LITERAL_RETURN

f1ef403f5e8fab7f9c68100f5089bb24ecf46bb9.commitMessage:
Added SimplifyBooleanExpressionCheck to find code like "if (b == true)".
Also fixed SimplyfyBooleanReturnCheck and introduced tests.

84eddc36730c1eca845257201c71a0d1fb2d40cf.commitMessage:
Added a new class TokenTypes that contains all the type constants. This class
breaks the circular dependencies - the cost is needing to maintain this class
when a new grammar is introduced.
